category: Evaluation Committee Regulations/Article 20 (Confirmation of Evaluation Results)
contents: Article 20 (Confirmation of evaluation results) ① The committee's evaluation results and assignment of evaluation grades are confirmed by a resolution of the Board of Directors of the Sports Association, and the evaluation grades are as follows. Revised 2019. 1. 31, 2020. 11. 5. 1. Excellent 2. Excellent 3. Good 4. Average 5. Insufficient ② For organizations subject to evaluation whose data submitted after the evaluation results were confirmed were confirmed to be false, the committee After a resolution, the evaluation results in Paragraph 1 can be canceled and the organization can be designated as an unsatisfactory organization. In this case, the subsidy based on the evaluation results is set at the minimum standard amount for the relevant year, and the difference is recovered. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2020. 11. 5.
